channel.title: HV Mutual Aid
channel.description: Recent content on HV Mutual Aid

item.title: HV Mutual Aid
item.description: We are a network of groups organizing to provide aid and support to New Yorkers in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic. HV Mutual Aid is committed to: Redirecting people and resources to those at the frontlines who are providing mutual aid, advocacy and services to the hardest-hit communities. Providing support to local groups leading the mutual aid efforts in their neighborhoods. Using the HV Mutual Aid network to channel resources and amplifying needs from the ground.
